account_id.description: Microsoft account ID performing the forward.

email_id.description: Identifier of the email to forward.

to.description: Recipient email address or list of addresses (max 500 unique across To/CC).

cc.description: Optional CC recipient(s) counted toward the 500 unique-recipient limit.

body.description: Optional plain-text comment to include with the forward (trimmed).

confirm.description: Must be true to authorize forwarding the email.
